title: Lisa Kudrow admits she's never watched 'Friends' (Wait, what?!)
text:
In a new interview with friend Kevin Nealon, "Friends" star Lisa Kudrow dropped a bomb on all of us -- she's never seen the show.

Nealon hosts a popular YouTube show "Hiking with Kevin" and the duo gets candid in a Los Angeles canyon.

Not only has she never seen the uber popular sitcom, she also reveals she didn't feel comfortable playing Phoebe Buffay during the 10-year run of the show.

"I had played dumb girls for sure," she said of the role, adding it wasn't really her, though.

"I feel like s--- I tricked them," she added of the audition for the show.

NBC via Getty Images, FILE

Kudrow said she "had to work hard" at being Phoebe and that by the "third season in, I was struggling so much."

She said it was Matt LeBlanc who helped her out after she told him it wasn't working.

"You're her, relax, you got it," she said he told her. "You're working too hard, that's the problem."

When Nealon asked if she noticed a difference looking back at seasons before and after she figured the character out, Kudrow shocked us all.

"Well, I haven't seen the show," she said with a straight face. "I should, I hear it's good!"

Wow!
description: In a new interview with friend Kevin Nealon,
